title: Effect of AD shift in the long run

content.prompt: Assume that the economy is in long-run equilibrium. A shift in the aggregate demand curve will change

choices.label: only the price level in the long run
only the output level in the long run
both the price level and the output level in the long run
neither the price level nor the output level in the short run
only the price level in the short run and only the output level in the long run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
